name: FPS Savior
description: Switch between High, Low, and Super Low graphic settings to help reduce lag. Not compatible with SFX Toggle. To toggle settings type [/fpssavior] ingame. For more information refer to the website.

name: Zoomy Plus
description: Zoom closer/farther then normal and rotate your camera to capture neat pictures. For help type [/zplus help] ingame or refer to the website for more information.
